tools.plotting.get_plot_lines¶

tools.plotting.get_plot_lines(n: int = 4) → Union[List[tuple], List[str]]¶

Returns different line-styles for plotting

Parameters

n (int, optional) – Number of different line-styles required

Returns

lines – List of different line-styles

Return type

list of str or list of tuple
